EmailTemplate.name: Global_Online_Build Data-Driven Internet of Things Applications White Paper_Q315
EmailTemplate.subject: IoT...Would You Like to Know More?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for downloading Building Data-Driven Internet of Things (IoT) Applications white paper. We know you're likely considering all the options available for extracting value from all of your data and we appreciate the chance to show you our leading data solutions for Digital Transformation.
For more about IoT and the technologies that were discussed in the whitepaper, please visit:
- IoT: The New Normal <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/p-o-v/iot-the-new-normal> - A Peek Under the Hood of The Connected Car <http://blog.pivotal.io/data-science-pivotal/features/a-peek-under-the-hood-of-the-connected-car-what-it-does-how-it-applies-to-iot-systems> - Creating the Foundations for the Internet of Things <http://pivotal.io/big-data/white-paper/capgemini-creating-the-foundations-for-the-internet-of-things> - Pivotal Big Data Suite <https://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite>
Pivotal is powering enterprise transformation by serving as a trusted IT partner to enterprises building, evolving, scaling and adapting IoT applications. Contact us <https://pivotal.io/contact> to learn how Pivotal can help advance your software-driven experiences.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
